description: Sister Violet has been having impure sexual thoughts and confesses her sin to Father Shadrack. After a proper pastoral counseling session, Father Shadrack offers her a way to absolution. First, she must demonstrate to him how she masturbates when she has her wicked fantasies while he holds a cross over her to help cleans her soul. But, just to make sure she has the complete experience to erase future curiosity, he subjects her to a thorough fucking, including anal, which takes her to the Pearly Gates of Heaven.
title: Bless Me Father, For I Have Sinned
